reviewText: Great for my grands. Instilling good things.
My grandchildren loved these DVDs. I wanted to find a good gift to get my grandchildren thinking about Jesus and now their mother says they're asking questions about getting saved.
My grandson loves these stories. He's three but he still gets the "message."
Great videos, I am very satisfied.
This DVD is a great way to help kids learn about the Bible.  I love watching kids sing along with the songs.

I bought this product for a family with four young boys, who immediately began squealing with delight when they found what was in the box.  They begged their mother to be able to watch one of the DVDs.  She agreed and we became surrounded by silence.

The Veggie Tales series are Christian-based stories free of any objectionable materials.  That was what helped me to make the decision to buy this product.  The boys' father is a pastor, and their mother leads the singing during the Sunday service, so finding an appropriate Christmas present for their children was important to me.

Not only does Amazon carry a varied selection of Veggie Tales, but the price of this set was affordable--the least costly of many sites I visited looking for Bible-based products.
great trip back in time from when the grandkids and I watched these - now it's the great grandkids! :)
good movie for the kids, would buy from this seller... Michael

Our child grew into them.
At first it was too boring for her. She was younger.
At the age of 21/2 she was mor into the stories & really enjoyed them.
God is bigger than the boogieman!

I absolutely loved this collection of Bible stories for my son! It teaches him about characters and events in the Bible in a fun and entertaining way! I will definitely be looking for more of these Bible stories in the future! Thanks! :)
Great dvd's, wish they could be a little longer.
